title: Please Take Pity On Me, My Queen - Novel Updates
genre: Josei   Mature   Romance   School Life   Shoujo
author: Zi WuShang
description:
She drew faint lines with her paintbrush,
His body was dyed with her colors,
When he finally realized that she wasn't a gentle goddess,
He had already boarded her pirate ship....

Upon their first meeting:
'Wha, What did you say?'
She smiled, 'You didn't hear me? I said----'
And his eyes widened, and his cheeks flushed...

This is the happy story of a wolf-in-sheep's-clothing girl slowly luring in her innocent tsundere senpai.
Goddess on the outside, sadistic on the inside queen X dim-witted and cold turned loyal puppy

A beautiful queen, an art major looking for a human model, a handsome and innocent puppy, seductions and mayhem ensue! >
